JobFullDesc: About the RoleThe Safety team’s goal is to make Uber the safest and most trusted transportation choice and to support our users with empathy and care when things go wrong. Uber is looking to set the global standard for ridesharing safety, and you can help drive that future!As a Senior User Experience Researcher, you’ll work with product, design, and other stakeholders to frame research questions, design mixed-method research plans, conduct research and analysis, and help the team form a shared understanding around aspects of safety that matter most to our customers and our business.This role requires a broad range of research skills and sensitivity to discussing difficult subject matter. The ability to thoughtfully discuss these challenges with internal partners as well as external research participants is paramount.What the Candidate Will DoDesign and conduct qualitative studies,
